channel.title: Zbook on UNIXETC
channel.description: Recent content in Zbook on UNIXETC

item.title: Debian下安装Zbook14无线网卡驱动
item.description: 首先查看无线网卡型号 alair@zb14:~$ lspci|grep less 02:00.0 Network controller: Intel Corporation Wireless 7260 (rev 73) 搜索Inter相关固件 ​ alair@zb14:~$ apt-cache search iwlwifi firmware-iwlwifi - Binary firmware for Intel Wireless cards 安装之 ​ alair@zb14:~$ apt-get install firmware-iwlwifi 重启完事儿！
